refnamediv.refpurpose: Process a response for a basic COM_* command send to the client

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
connection
Mysqlnd connection handle. Do not modify!
ok_packet
The OK packet type.
silent
Whether mysqlnd may emit errors.
command
The COM command to process results from.
ignore_upsert_status
Whether to ignore UPDATE/INSERT status.
